review_data.title: Amusing. Great food.
review_data.content: Visited Big Ben, with my husband. It has got amazing collection of beers. The food is lovely as well. The quality of both food and beverage was quite amazing.

review_data.title: Average
review_data.content: The beer is good. The burger is not more than average, but expensive. It's a nice bar to have some beers and watch a game, but not more.

review_data.title: It's okay

review_data.title: Nice pub

review_data.title: Okayish pub

review_data.title: Had fun here.
review_data.content: Me and my co-workers came here for a few drinks. We did not eat anything. The atmosphere was nice, the staff and patrons were pleasant. This was the only place I was able to get a Smithwick's. :) We enjoyed ourselves.

review_data.title: Big Bens Pub Westside

review_data.title: Nice experience..
review_data.content: Visited here with a stag party and had a greatt few hours here, drinking and playing darts etc.. great beers on tap and the staff are most welcoming and friendly. we actually visited twice on the day and it was most enjoyable.

review_data.title: Always a great athmosphere

review_data.title: Great beer, great staff

review_data.title: Beer & soccer
review_data.content: Nice bar in city centre. They show also some soccer ganes on the television of the champions league on different screens in the pub.

review_data.title: Good spot
review_data.content: Chill spot for a brew or two, afternoons it's pretty quiet I'm sure it get better as the evening goes on

review_data.title: Great Barman

review_data.title: Simple pub with great service crew
review_data.content: If you want to hang out with your friends over a few beers and need a power bank to charge your mobile phone. Great stuff! Big Ben is the place for you. A very attentive crew takes care of the guests.

review_data.title: Otimo para lanches

review_data.title: Good stop for a Beer

review_data.title: Welcoming Irish English Pub

review_data.title: Good for a quiet pint
review_data.content: First time in Zurich and I came across Big Ben. It's good spot for a quiet beer after work. The service is good but make sure you eat before you settle in .very close to the train station as well .

review_data.title: Nice place :)
review_data.content: Came here a few times while in Zurich for the weekend.. Service was good and so was the atmosphere! Saturday night busier than the Sunday but still enjoyable place! Recommend 😊

review_data.title: Good service and good place for a few beers

review_data.title: Klassisches Pub, angenehme Preise
review_data.content: Originales Pub mit grosser Bierauswahl und Hochprozentigem (speziell Whiskey und Gin). TV mit Sport in jeder Ecke. Bedienung an der...More

review_data.title: Nice Pub, great location and Guinness on draught
review_data.content: Great Central location(Niederdorf near river and full of bars and restaurants) and frew tables outside too. Crowded on weekends, both locals and tourists. Friendly service and perfectly poured Guinness, so what else do you need :)

review_data.title: Nice place
review_data.content: Good food e nice drinks. A rocks vibe with sports. The price is not that expensive but us not cheap. Good music. Close for clubs in the area

review_data.title: Everything was just okay

review_data.title: Typical pub
review_data.content: A typical pub which is unfortunately often frequented by quite aggressive behaving Ice Hockey fans. If no game is on a place to go.

review_data.title: Great service and nice people
review_data.content: Some of my friends am me come here every month or even week because the have a wide range of beer and high-percentive alcohol. Great if you want to play a little dart and if you're on route with a large group of people.

review_data.title: Mainstream with a local atmosphere

review_data.title: Average, fine for having a beer and watching a game
review_data.content: Pub service, nothing more, nothing less. It's a good place to watch a game, but expect casual service and average food and drink.

review_data.title: Durchschnitt

review_data.title: Cervejas muito boas.
review_data.content: Não tenho muito que falar. O ambiente é gostoso e tranquilo para saborear as diversas cervejas disponibilizadas pelo pub.

review_data.title: nice staff

review_data.title: Excelent!!!!
review_data.content: Excelent pub. Nice beer. Mr. Egan is a friendly bartender who attend everyone with hopitality and kindness. Wonderfull environment to have a beer a watch some sports.

review_data.title: The Best Beer in Zurich

review_data.title: Week in Zurich May 2015

review_data.title: Irish style

review_data.title: Buon pub

review_data.title: Good Pub

review_data.title: My favourite Zurich bar
review_data.content: Big Ben Pub has been my favourite place in Zurich ever since I've lived here, over 13 years now. It's a blend of passing tourists and local Swiss, which possibly explains why it's not a favourite of expats, although the staff generally do speak English....More

review_data.title: Bier und Service
review_data.content: Wie immer netter Service und gutes Bier oder Wein. Sind immer dort wenn wir in Zürich sind. Klein aber gemütlich.
